Headline: Inside As You Wish, the Princess Bride-themed pop-up bar
Article_Body: Inside As You Wish: Chicago bar The Sixth's latest pop-up is dedicated to the movie "The Princess Bride." Here's a look inside.   A themed menu: The bar offers 16 themed cocktails, as well as high-end snacks.  The Shortage of Perfect Breasts Cocktail: This cocktail features Empress gin, Norden Aquavit grain spirit, Salers liqueur, sugar snap peas and citric acid.  Princess Buttercup and Westley: The walls of the pop-up feature  book cover versions of the main characters.  Staying on brand: One wall is covered with stills and quotes from the film.  The Twue Wuve cocktail: This drink is made of Lucy Pistolas mezcal, Arakku liquor, Fino Sherry, caramel pineapple simple syrup, coconut and blueberry foam.   Life-sized cutouts: Princess Buttercup and Westley live in another corner of the pop-up. (Think selfie station here.)  "Anybody Want a Peanut?": Old Georgia Rye, peanut whiskey, Cynar and banana oat milk are shaken together and topped with peanut brittle to create this homage to one of the movie's famous lines.  Inspiring romance: The bar's romantic lighting and cozy seating attract couples looking for a place to celebrate their anniversaries. "Inconceivable!" Tequila, Aperol, green chartreuse, strawberry-jalapeno cordial and oyster tincture are combined here and topped with a chocolate-covered strawberry.
